actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit for high speed rail and certain other mass transportation equipment.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an investment tax credit for mass transportation property which: (1) is a highspeed rail system, a magnetic levitation system, or other land transit system, or a water or air transit system; (2) is operated under franchise, license, or other regulatory approval; (3) charges a fare-for-hire; (4) is open to the general public with restriction (other than fares and times or service); and (5) does not directly use or consume fossil fuels or their derivatives for normal operation. Makes such credit application only for property produced in the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit for high speed rail and certain other mass transportation equipment.
